tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
It was my first pregnancy and we consulted Dr. Amrita throughout pregnancy. Delivery was also done by her. 

She has a vast experience as a Gynec *** *** ********* ********* *** *** ********* ******* ****** * **** She would score less points on friendliness, so please do not expect sugar coated words of care from her. She is straightforward with her diagnosis and was always right.

Finally, she tried and gave her best for me to get normal delivery done. Never impatient and didn't give up on me.

We have immense respect for her as a doctor since the delivery and totally recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I strongely recomment this doctor for gynec issues. I had an issue with my endometrium lining which was quite complicated. She helped me with understanding the problem as I had visited two more doctors earlier and they had suggested me to undergo chemo as the reports were inappropriate/ ambiguous. Amrita mam was the one who asked to get it retested since the report was ambiguous/not clear. After retest/reassessment she prescribed me appropriate medicines and it was successful. I conceived naturally post that, however I had twin babies and to my bad luck both of them didn’t have heartbeat and had to abort it. She helped me get through this physical & emotional stress. Now we are blessed with a lovely baby gal, not to mention again, we consulted her again for our pre and post delivery care. Our baby is healthy, her medicine prescriptions were accurate, and was always available for any of my medical issues over phone/whatsapp. Kudos to Amrita mam. She is a busy doctor in this city, so please don’t expect any casual talks,  she talks strictly to the point. Some people feel she is rude but she isn’t so. Even in OT during the surgery, she held my hand and was very encouraging, filling all the confidence that I was losing out looking at so many people there. She said it’s gonna be alright and it was all right!!! Thank you Amrita for standing beside me in this difficult journey of mine!!

tags: None
review: I will recommend her with eyes shut.She is no less than God for us. I regret that I went to her very late when I was 5 months pregnent, I had lot of complications n it was high risk pregnancy with high sugar.the way she took care n explained everything and told us how to go about it was very helpful. We were very scared till we met her but the whole pregnancy experience changed .she was available on call and what's app whenever I needed.Only because of the Dr.Amrita i had a 'healthy' late pre term baby,she is 5 months old now.Thanks a lot doctor.

tags: None
review:
we were in very bad situation when we consulted to Amrita Rao.
my wifes had mumps infection during pregnancy.other dotors already said we have to terminate this child since mumps is very bad during pragnancy.but the way she had advised us its amazing.finally we came out with this issue & got our lovely daughter Aaditri....Thank you very much Amrita Mam..God Bless you.for us u is GOD only

tags: None
review: Not a very good experience with her. Not very welcoming. I felt she is very mechanical, too professional atleast for the first time maternity consultation. I was expecting a warmth and caring approach from her as a obstetrician. Considering her experience and expertise *** **** ** *** ***** but never felt really pleased talking to her.

tags: None
review: Though the Doctor seems to be not so free and easy to discuss about, outside the medical box, what we non-medicos generally have and do not understand, however would recommend her as Doctor knows the condition of the patient very well and do the best. She has taken care well enough of my wife and baby throughout out the 9 Months.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is Very quick in diagnosis and treatment of the issue. In the current scenario of doctors taking maximum appointments and rushing between two rooms, Dr. Amrita has shown to be THE MOST THOUGHTFUL doctor. She didn’t miss to check on me regularly at the hospital, explained the treatment and surgery patiently to me and also provided the precautions I need to take, even before I remembered to ask her. I felt she really cared and wanted to support her patients in all ways possible.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She has handled my second pregnancy. ( First pregnancy was a miscarriage in 2013). I was APLA positive. She prescribed heparin injection throughout 9 months with ecospirin. She supported me throughout and I delivered my baby girl in 2014 through c section. God's grace our baby is healthy. All her assessments were accurate. Thanks a lot to Dr. Amrita.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
** ** **** **** * **** * **** ********* ** ****** *** I am little disappointed with the hospital formalities..
I went there for the first time and they took 200 registration fee for first time visit.. and that process took almost half an hour. I don't know about the emergency case but if you are free for the day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very professional doctor . She did not prescribe any unwanted medicines and always suggested home remedies for problems during pregnancy like acidity , constipation etc . Even during the delivery , there were some minor complications and chances of going for C section , however due to her expertise she made a normal delivery for my wife and baby without using forceps . No sugar coated words,very frank and direct.*** ** *** *****

review: *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** for me and my husband she is our god as mine was a very complicated case and she handled it so seamlessly, we were always comfortable with her, would recommend her for all gynecology and even infertility issues. *** ** *** ******** we love you doctor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** *** ************* ******* * **** **** I met her after my first miscarriage and before planning for my next pregnancy . It was such a wonderful journey. She helped me sail through my fears and worries . Without her I wouldn’t have felt confident through the journey. I would wait to meet her in my next appointment as meeting her would bring so much happiness and confidence. No sugar coated words but answers all our queries to the point which I loved the most. Had a normal delivery and was too lucky to have her care for me and my little one! Always will recommend her to anyone who expects the best care!

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ***** ****** ** ********** I had my 1st delivery done by Dr. Amrita Rao in 2007; and I had another baby girl last year. I could'nt have thought of any other doctor for my second delivery. The best part about her is she is 'to the point', very practical and doesn't believe in granny tales in medication. She has in fact motivated me to also think practical & not emotional. She doesn't need to spend hours together with any patient as I feel it is not required to do so also; she is a doctor not a counselor :). She has never left any of our queries unanswered though.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ***** **** ********** ** ** ******* *********never listened my fear my doubts with care...when I asked something she became irritated....not friendly at all..as I am a bengali so I faced problems to communicate in hindi...her patient level is very very very low****** ***** ********** ** ******** *** talked like she provide me free service...I went bengalore from uttar dinajpur only to meet her...but she just prescribed me pills...no medical investigations is done by her...never recommended this doctor..

tags: None
review:
*** ****** **** ** *** ** *** **** *** ***** ** *** ****** I will never forget the kind of confidence she gave me on the night of delivery when there was a complication. She rushed to the hospital hearing about my situation and did a c section to quickly take the baby out in under half an hour.

I would recommend that every one of you out there go to her and just listen to whatever she says without a second thought. We love you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor is really very good, professional, doesn't alarm the patient and explains the issue. I highly recommend her.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: My experience with Dr. Amrita Rao was very good. She was very pleasant to talk with and she explained my problems to me very well and answered all my questions very patiently. She also took some time to educate me about a healthy lifestyle and how to prevent further problems and what to do in case of emergencies. I definitely reccommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor is good and knows about the health problems in depth. She explained us in a very simple way and asked us to go for natural remedies instead of completely relying on medicines. Apart from that she has also prescribed medicines for time being.

tags: None
review: She was quite professional and efficient with examination. However, she straight away proceed with prescription and we had to probe her for giving more information as she seemed too busy with handling patients and succeeding appointments. Finally when she explained the context to us better, we were more at peace. Intending to go back for follow up and hope to have a pleasant experience.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr. Amrita Rao is very professional with a very caring attitude. She gives the right advice without creating any dilemma. Very happy to be consulting her. Thank you doctor for all your guidance.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
